"A.D.2028/3/28/14:00": "Haah- We ate alot haven't we! Soo full, I'm really satisfied!"
"Aru also gobbled up the cakes and donuts the way we did too."
"That's right, he's the same as us. From eating a meal, laughing, being surprised... That means Aru and that world..."
"Ah- Nevermind. Let's have some green tea and make our way. Where's the waiter-"
"After your drink, please take this. It's a present from me."
"Ah- umm... Who are you?"
"Well, please don't mind me. Rather than thanking me, I should be thanking you."
"Beautiful, young ladies with her tea. That really shakes my inspiration. Moreso, we're really fortunate."
"...Looks like something weird came our way. Do you know him Kohri?"
"O-of course not! I don't know who this strange man is!"
"Young ladies, what are you whispering about? People can hear you, you know."
"For you, young ladies, I would recommend our \"Tora-Toraâ™ª\" app that's still in development."
"This app is full of confidence. Without talking, start the app and it'll send your thoughts to the other person! It's a mood telepathy app!"
"It's perfect for trading stories in secret without being heard by anyone. We're talking about high school student's secrets. The blooming flowers of high school girls."
"I want both of you to really try it before this app is released but... What do you think?"
"What a creepy person we have. He even gave us these monitors to use. I think I saw him somewhere before... Kohri, you sure you really don't know him?"
"S-stop asking the same thing! ...I think we did see him before but- I don't even know this type of person!"
"Aren't you like long-lost siblings?"
"I don't feel like he's part of my family!"
"...Well, even if I behaved like a brother, I wouldn't have ruined your vibes. Okay okay, I'm sorry."
"Hitsugi... Even if this creepy person is related to me, we don't look alike."
"...H-hey both of you! It's rude to keep talking behind peoples backs!"
"What? All our thoughts were sent properly! I knew it, this app is useless."
"It's obvious because it's not fully developed yet! You talk to the monitor! THE MONITOR!"
"Seriously... High school girls these days are scary when they don't hold back... But, I guess it's a good thing."
"Kohri, call the police. Shout \"There's a pervert here!\", and they should come straight away."
"You're really blunt!"
"T-THERE'S A PERVERT HERE!!!"
"Hold your horses for a minute!"
"Geez, it's not like they're going to come. There're already restrictions placed within the Ether Communication. Reporting is just a waste."
"You see, I'm actually famous around here. If you got peoples attention then it'll be a huge hassle. The media will have to reduce more transmissions."
"...So you're a criminal? Guilty from charges against minors?"
"Of course not! Look, here's my ID!"
"Hagito... Anie? YMT Corporation's President and CEO... Wai- I think I heard that name before."
"YMT Corporation- you mean, THE company that created the app we used for buying Aru's clothes that day?"
"Yes, running on the for-front of the Ether communication era, is I, the young president of the YMT Corporation, Hagito Anie!"
"...Aaah, that Military Otaku eh. What can we, as ordinary high school girls, do for the famous \"young president\" today?"
"...Just ordinary high school girls eh?"
"Something wrong with that?"
"Nope, of course not. Well then, beautiful young ladies, thank you for your cooperation. I'm looking forward to seeing you again."
"...Somehow that person gives off bad vibes..."
"I agree with you Aru, he's really weird."
"Like you, Kohri."
"That's right!"
"You're soo cruel Aru! Hitsugi, why did you agree with him!?"
"But... Hitsugi. Who was that person just now?"
"...I have no idea. But, we do know something."
"We should give them a tip for our green tea."
"There it is again. The strange distortion of technology levels on Earth."
"Their communication software and technology are the same level as ours. Yet their Hardware technology isn't up to date."
"This is weird... It's strange, really. It seems like The so called \"Ether\" communication particle is hiding something."
